segments.text: Observing this kitchen, the woman's deep in her dish-drying routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding the plate close, wiping it with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the sink behind her is a waterfall of overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water rushes out, drenching the floor and her unaware foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens, threatening to trip someone soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Near the cabinets, the cookie jar tempts the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool boldly, ignoring its tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach is long, fingers snagging those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's expectant pose shows she's in on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her open palm waits for her share of the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside is so orderly and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This hidden naughtiness contrasts with the adult's innocence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away; it's all too tense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tied-back curtains let in that peaceful light anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR
